message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that to the right buyer. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but $10,000 is simply not enough for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's make a deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to pay more than $9,500 for it. I hope this proposal is within your consideration.

Bob, while I appreciate your interest, $9,500 is still below what I need to make this worthwhile. I'm willing to come down to $10,000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a good deal for both of us. What do you say?
